to demand money from someone: He claimed he would rather go to prison than continue being dunned by the taxman. One of his jobs was dunning customers for money they owed.

to demand money from someone: He claimed he would rather go to prison than continue being dunned by the taxman.dun sb for sth One of his jobs was dunning customers for bills.
